Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

Download this project as a .zip file Download this project as a tar.gz file

CHAPTER 230 Manager

230.01 Manager is Planning Director.

230.02 Employment contracts.

230.03 Contracting authority and procedures.

230.04 Investment policy.

230.05 Advertising for and awarding of single aggregate bids for public improvements.

230.06 Records management policy.

230.07 Expenditure of City funds for bereavement or illness of a person of importance.

CROSS REFERENCES

Authority - see CHTR. Sec. 4.04(c)

General provisions - see CHTR. Art. VI

Transition of functions - see CHTR. Sec. 13.12

Duties re Council meetings - see ADM. 220.01 (Rule 10)

Traffic control powers - see TRAF. 406.01 et seq.

Orders to abate nuisances in unclean habitations - see GEN. OFF. 668.13

Orders during fires or water shortages - see S.U. & P.S. 1042.22

As Housing Officer - see P. & Z. 1224.09
